{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3624777,"name":"Max Piroumian","username":"MaxPpod","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/m/c37758/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-05-14T22:46:40.884Z","cooked":"

I’m trying to run the drivetrain on my robot but the left side just clicks whenever I try to run the motor. Eventually, it moves for a little bit and gets stuck again. If you look closely, motor 3 jerks when that clicking happens. Does anyone know what the issue is?
Here’s a video: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1eFodPjNDleqTRYNEL5FE7w9bZTjIoNcV/view?usp=drivesdk

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":6,"updated_at":"2025-05-14T22:46:40.884Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":185,"readers_count":184,"score":47.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":501750,"topic_slug":"cim-motor-gearbox-clicking","display_username":"Max Piroumian","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://drive.google.com/file/d/1eFodPjNDleqTRYNEL5FE7w9bZTjIoNcV/view?usp=drivesdk","internal":false,"reflection":false,"clicks":32}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":75786,"hidden":false,"trust_level":0,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/cim-motor-gearbox-clicking/501750/1","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3624804,"name":"Billfred Leverette (he/him/not Bill)","username":"Billfred","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/billfred/{size}/225278_2.png","created_at":"2025-05-14T23:35:26.263Z","cooked":"

Obvious ones:

  • With power off, spin the wheels. Do they move smoothly?
  • Pull the motors out of the gearbox. Do all of them spin in the same direction?

My money is on motors fighting each other.

Motors Fighting -115
Something in code +200
Something jamming the Gearbox +350

Place your bets

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":6,"updated_at":"2025-05-15T00:08:38.291Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":157,"readers_count":156,"score":201.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":501750,"topic_slug":"cim-motor-gearbox-clicking","display_username":"Justin Montois","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":11}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":4746,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"3015 | Drive Coach | FRC Top 25 | Tactical Genius"},"post_url":"/t/cim-motor-gearbox-clicking/501750/3","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":9},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":2},{"id":"laughing","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":12,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3624829,"name":"EricH","username":"EricH","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/erich/{size}/128938_2.png","created_at":"2025-05-15T00:50:10.856Z","cooked":"

I’d be thinking a key fell out and is bouncing around. When you hand-spin the wheels, have someone listening to the gearbox for rattling.

Motors fighting each other is also a decent option, but they don’t suddenly start working together then start fighting again, in my experience.
